title: Darkhotel APT
extract: DarkHotel. From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. DarkHotel (or Darkhotel) is a targeted spear-phishing spyware and malware-spreading campaign that appears to be selectively attacking business hotel visitors through the hotel's in-house WiFi network. It is characterized by Kaspersky Lab as an advanced persistent threat ...
